column4: hey guys! problem: cannot connect to my home wifi network. wifi works, i input correct password but it cannot connect. Acer Aspire One here. ideas?
hey guys! problem: cannot connect to my home wifi network. wifi works, i input correct password but it cannot connect. Acer Aspire One here. ideas?
do acers have known wifi instability?
because mine is terrible on some networks
any tips on making it more stable?
at school i normally end up under win7 or with a patch cable
if i has any idea i would make my connect now. my wifi works, but it dont want to connect to my wifi network. seems it does not accept my key
for me it works but half the time it stops communicating and builds up a packet buffer
then after liek half a minute everything is transfered again and it works for 30 seconds
it gets extremely annoying so i use ethernet when possible, it happens under WEP at home but also on an unprotected network at school
same here. yesterday i left it to download and went out. when i came back it disconnected from the home wifi network and since then it wont accept my password :(((((((((
sometimes it takes it an huor to fetch 5 new packages
i have win xp on the same machine but what is the point of ubuntu then. this must be fixed
i have win7 with ubuntu installed via wubi
Acer Aspire One laptop here. yes i did. i restarted the whole router and the laptop, tried win xp = no problem. back on ubuntu - problem
